parameter.name: symbol-synchronizer-loop-bandwidth
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter reports the symbol synchronizer loop bandwidth expressed as symbol rate to subcarrier frequency ratio.

parameter.name: symbol-synchronizer-lock-status
actual-symbol-rate
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter reports the actually received symbol rate in 1/1000 symbols/second, i.e. this parameter reflects the Doppler shift of the symbol rate.

parameter.name: es-over-no
parameter.SemanticDefinition: This parameter reports the estimated symbol energy over noise density ratio (ES/N0) in 1/100 dB. The algorithms used to calculate this estimate tend to saturate at a certain ES/N0 level that the reported estimate may be significantly too low. However, this saturation happens at levels that are so high that the telemetry is anyway virtually error free.
